decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The display of the advertisement hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The advertisment display hereby approved shall be removed on or before 03/09/2014.
Condition : 3 - No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission
Condition : 4 - Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisments, shall be maintained in a condition that does not impair the visual amenity of the site
Condition : 5 - Any structure or hoarding erected and used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not endanger the public
description: Installation of two non-illuminated advertising panels
